fields.name: FailedControls
fields.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance controls of the given standard with a failed state

fields.name: PassedControls
fields.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance controls of the given standard with a passed state

fields.name: SkippedControls
fields.description: The number of supported regulatory compliance controls of the given standard with a skipped state

fields.name: State
fields.description: Aggregative state based on the standard's supported controls states

fields.name: UnsupportedControls
fields.description: The number of regulatory compliance controls of the given standard which are unsupported by automated assessments
